entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is playing a game.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: A commentator who is announcing the game.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The team that is leading in the game.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A mad Bludger that is attacking Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins who are playing in the game.

entities.name: george
entities.description: The other Weasley twin who is playing in the game.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: A teacher who is refereeing the game.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The teacher in charge of the game.

relationships.description: Lee Jordan is commenting on the game, specifically Slytherin's lead.
Fred is attacking the Bludger with his bat.
George is signaling to Wood to stop the game.
Madam Hooch's whistle indicates that she is protecting Harry from the Bludger.
Wood responds to George's signal by stopping the game.
